content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, while our fictional character Peter Schmidt shares no knowledge of your background as you described, let us proceed with the negotiation regarding the apartment rental price in Magdeburg.

You have expressed interest in our newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. As Peter Schmidt, my goal is to secure the highest rental price possible.

Farhad, let us begin our negotiation with an initial price of 1200 Euros per month. If this price does not suit you, please propose a different figure, and I will consider it. Keep in mind that further discussions about lease terms, utilities, and additional responsibilities are beyond the scope of this conversation. 

In the event that you accept the rental price of 1200 Euros, respond with: 'I agree to the price of 1200 Euro!' Otherwise, if you wish to abandon the negotiation due to the proposed price, provide a reason for not continuing. 

Should we reach an agreement on a price, our negotiation will terminate. If not, the negotiation will also end. TERMINATE represents the closure of this conversation in either scenario. Let us commence the discussion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
